SEARCH
Package cop4331.client

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
cop4331.client.User
cop4331.client.Customer
public class Customer extends User
The Customer class represents a customer user in the system. It extends the User class and includes a shopping cart.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Customer

      public Customer()
      Default constructor. Initializes the customer with an empty cart.

    • Customer

      public Customer(String id, String username, String password)
      Parameterized constructor. Initializes the customer with the specified id, username, and password, and an empty cart.
      Parameters:
      id - the customer's id
      username - the customer's username
      password - the customer's password

    • Customer

      Parameterized constructor. Initializes the customer with the specified id, username, password, and cart.
      Parameters:
      id - the customer's id
      username - the customer's username
      password - the customer's password
      cart - the customer's cart
